name: TestFlight_Drones
description:
A prototype combat flight arcade featuring modern jets

One controlled players is available. The remaining four jets are very simple drones which become aggressive toward all other jets  if they take any damage.

The controls are:

  • A - Turn left
  • D - Turn right
  • O - Fire Cannon
  • P - 'Slide' manuevre
  • J and K - Scroll between the four playable jets
